fullDescription.text: Newtonsoft.Json 10.0.1 has the following vulnerabilities: [:yellow_circle:] BDSA-2018-5195

help.markdown:
## Upgrade Guidance



| **Affected Dependency**  | **Recommended short term version** | **Recommended long term version** |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| Newtonsoft.Json 10.0.1  | 10.0.3  | 13.0.3 |



[Click Here To See More Details in Black Duck](https://us03-qa-hub11.nprd.sig.synopsys.com//api/projects/be0f8c7b-45e3-4e76-bf1d-0e29e2a8414d/versions/7950b1e8-096b-44f7-bc02-81de36652b1c/vulnerability-bom?selectedComponent=30090830-3239-455d-8850-e7d7ef7a4677)

## Vulnerabilities(BDSA,CVE)

 
| **Severity**  | **Vulnerability** | **Summary** | **Solution Available?** | **Workaround Available?** |
| :--- |:--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| :yellow_circle: | [BDSA-2018-5195](https://openhub.net/vulnerabilities/bdsa/BDSA-2018-5195) | Newtonsoft.Json Vulnerable to Denial-of-Service (DoS) via Stack Overflow During Nested JSON Serialization | Yes | Yes |




## References
* Common Weakness Enumeration: [CWE-770](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/770.html)
